text: 14.24: Zo 16.8Nde maaŋ muuŋgip, nde za Fhe Bakɨme wo buni vhuuin nde nɨɨŋgi, nde nta bun suanga, maaŋ muuŋgip, guigira Zisas khothɨgi fhuv guma o, nde kha bigi kaŋgi fhuv guma the nde vhen zirɨrga, nde nzuai buni guigira ana thɨgɨrga, ana khueŋ kaŋgirga, ana tɨvi mbatɨgi ga mbui guma ma. Ana mba mbararagi bigi za ana suaŋv suaŋgirga.
